meanings.sent1: Having a helpful and advantageous tool can make tasks easier.
meanings.sent2: It is advantageous to have good friends who support you.
meanings.sent3: It was quite advantageous to have an umbrella when unexpected rain poured down.
meanings.sent4: Her quick thinking proved to be advantageous in the challenging situation.
meanings.sent5: The flashlight was advantageous in guiding us through the dark cave.

meanings.sent1: Wearing sunscreen is advantageous to protect your skin from the sun.
meanings.sent2: It is advantageous to start your day with a healthy breakfast.
meanings.sent3: Carrying an extra pen turned out to be advantageous during the exam.
meanings.sent4: The early morning light cast an advantageous glow on the garden.
meanings.sent5: His positive attitude was advantageous in lifting the team's spirits.

meanings.sent1: Having a map is advantageous when exploring a new city.
meanings.sent2: It can be advantageous to arrive early for a job interview.
meanings.sent3: Wearing comfortable shoes proved to be advantageous during the long hike.
meanings.sent4: The new software update provided an advantageous feature for users.
meanings.sent5: The extra practice was advantageous in improving her performance.
